## Load Required Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(mice)
library(broom)
library(naniar) # For visualizing missingness
```

## Simulate Dataset

```{r}
set.seed(42)

n <- 500
sim_data <- tibble(
  x1 = rnorm(n),
  x2 = rnorm(n),
  y  = 0.5 * x1 + 0.3 * x2 + rnorm(n)
)

```
